tailorsachet:itemdesc-stitchpuller: A stitch puller for tailors to recover twine and cloth.
tailorsachet:itemdesc-dyesachet-small-dr: A delicate bag filled with a dry powder used by tailors.
tailorsachet:itemdesc-dyesachet-medium-d: A delicate bag packed with a dry powder used by tailors.
tailorsachet:itemdesc-dyesachet-large-dr: A delicate bag stuffed with a dry powder used by tailors.
tailorsachet:itemdesc-dyesachet-small-so: A sodden bag filled with a small portion of reactive paste used by tailors.
tailorsachet:itemdesc-dyesachet-medium-s: A sodden bag filled with a moderate portion of reactive paste used by tailors.
tailorsachet:itemdesc-dyesachet-large-so: A sodden bag filled with a heaping portion of reactive paste used by tailors.
